mapper.select: SELECT CLASS_NO,CLASS_NAME,CLASS_TYPE,PROF_NAME,PROFESSOR_NO,CLASS_SUMMARY FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR ON TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR.PROFESSOR_NO=TB_PROFESSOR.PROF_NO JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_TYPE LIKE '전공%' AND C.DEPT_NO=#{dNo}

SELECT CLASS_NO,CLASS_NAME,CLASS_TYPE,PROF_NAME,PROFESSOR_NO,CLASS_SUMMARY FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR ON TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR.PROFESSOR_NO=TB_PROFESSOR.PROF_NO JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_TYPE LIKE '교양%'

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, CREDIT, PROF_NAME, PROF_LAB, PROF_EMAIL, CLASS_SUMMARY, CLASS_GOAL, LEC_METHOD, EVAL_METHOD, ASSIGNMENT, LEC_EXPERIMENT, RELATED_LEC, LEC_TEXTBOOK, EXAM_POINTS, ASSIGN_POINTS, ATTEND_POINTS FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN LP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo} AND PROFESSOR_NO=#{pNo}

SELECT LECTURE_NO,LECTURE_NAME,LECTURE_REFERENCE,LECTURE_EXPLANATION FROM TB_CLASS_DETAIL LEFT JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo} AND PROFESSOR_NO=#{pNo} ORDER BY LECTURE_NO ASC

SELECT STD_NO,RETURN_STATUS,ABS_STATUS,CURRENT_STATE,DEPT_NAME,STD_NAME,SEMESTER,ABS_REASON,ABSENCE_FILE FROM TB_ABSENCE_STD AB JOIN TB_STUDENT S USING (STD_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo}

SELECT STD_NO,CURRENT_STATE,DEPT_NAME,STD_NAME,SEMESTER,GRADUATE_DELAY_STATUS,EXPELLED_STATUS,GRD_EXP_FILE,SEMESTER FROM TB_GRD_EXP_STD JOIN TB_STUDENT S USING (STD_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo}
SELECT DEPT_NAME, SEMESTER, STD_NO, STD_NAME FROM TB_STUDENT S JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPT_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo}

SELECT STD_NAME, DEPT_NAME,SEMESTER, SUBSTR(STD_SSN,1,2) AS YEAR, SUBSTR(STD_SSN,3,2) AS MONTH,SUBSTR(STD_SSN,5,2) AS DAY,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2) AS SYSYEAR,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,4,2) AS SYSMONTH,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,7,2) AS SYSDAY FROM TB_STUDENT S JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo}

SELECT STD_NAME, DEPT_NAME,SEMESTER,SUBSTR(ENT_DATE,1,2) AS ENYEAR, SUBSTR(ENT_DATE,4,2) AS ENMONTH,SUBSTR(ENT_DATE,7,2) AS ENDAY,SUBSTR(GRADUATION_DATE,1,4) AS GYEAR, SUBSTR(GRADUATION_DATE,6,2) AS GMONTH,SUBSTR(GRADUATION_DATE,9,2) AS GDAY,GRD_NO,DEGREE, SUBSTR(STD_SSN,1,2) AS YEAR, SUBSTR(STD_SSN,3,2) AS MONTH,SUBSTR(STD_SSN,5,2) AS DAY,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2) AS SYSYEAR,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,4,2) AS SYSMONTH,SUBSTR(SYSDATE,7,2) AS SYSDAY FROM TB_STUDENT S JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) JOIN TB_GRADUATE_STD G USING(STD_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo}

SELECT STD_NO,SEM_YEAR, SEME_NO,COUNT(AVG_POINT) AS COUNT,COUNT(CLASS_NO) AS CREDIT, AVG(POINT)AS POINT, SUM(AVG_POINT) AS AVG_POINT FROM TB_SEMESTER_POINT WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo} GROUP BY STD_NO,SEM_YEAR,SEME_NO ORDER BY SEM_YEAR,SEME_NO

SELECT PROF_NAME,CLASS_NAME,CLASS_TYPE,STD_NO,SEM_YEAR,SEME_NO,POINT,AVG_POINT FROM TB_SEMESTER_POINT JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR USING(PROF_NO) JOIN TB_STUDENT S USING(STD_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE SEM_YEAR = #{semYear} AND SEME_NO = #{semNo}

SELECT DEPT_NAME,STD_NAME,STD_NO,SEM_YEAR, SEME_NO,COUNT(AVG_POINT) AS COUNT, COUNT(CLASS_NO) AS CREDIT, AVG(POINT)AS POINT, SUM(AVG_POINT) AVG_POINT, SYSDATE FROM TB_SEMESTER_POINT JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR USING(PROF_NO) JOIN TB_STUDENT S USING(STD_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) WHERE STD_NO = #{sNo} AND SEM_YEAR =#{semYear} AND SEME_NO = #{semNo} GROUP BY STD_NO,SEM_YEAR,SEME_NO,STD_NAME,DEPT_NAME ORDER BY SEM_YEAR,SEME_NO
